text: so it's pretty clear that this is a
fairly large drone a not the classic
plastic garden drone you will see this
is a commercial size drone that is
clearly being operated deliberately in a
way that every time Gatwick ceases that
tries to reopen the runway
the drones reappear so this is quite
clearly a deliberate act and a very
clear message to give to whoever is
doing this there is a five-year jail
sentence for this kind of action and
anybody who does this should expect to
go to jail for many years any indication
as to why someone would want to do no
sense of motive there is no suggestion
that this is a terrorist act that you
counterterrorism police have been very
clear that they've seen no evidence this
is intended to be a terrorist act it's
clearly somebody who wants to disrupt
Gatwick Airport and there was an intense
police operation the two local police
forces in Surrey and Sussex working
together to try and catch the
perpetrator supported by the Met
supported by the counterterrorism police
then no evidence of a terrorist link at
the moment
